absurd.dev_description_en: Jokes that are surreal, bizarre, or intentionally absurd.

christmas.dev_description_en: Jokes about Christmas and the holiday season.

culture.dev_description_en: Jokes about culture and cultural differences.

dad-joke.dev_description_en: Jokes that are so bad, they're good.

dark.dev_description_en: Jokes that are dark, offensive, and often demeaning.

intellectual.dev_description_en: Jokes that require a certain level of intelligence or knowledge to understand.

knock-knock.dev_description_en: Jokes that follow the knock-knock format.

movies.dev_description_en: Jokes about movies, actors and the film industry.

music.dev_description_en: Jokes about music, musicians and the music industry.

one-liner.dev_description_en: Jokes that are short and to the point.

programming.dev_description_en: Jokes about programming and programming languages.

pun.dev_description_en: Jokes that are puns, or play on words.

regional.dev_description_en: Jokes about specific regions of the world.

sarcasm.dev_description_en: Jokes that are sarcastic or ironic.

spooky.dev_description_en: Jokes about ghosts, ghouls, and the halloween season.

tech.dev_description_en: Jokes about technology and the tech industry.

video-games.dev_description_en: Jokes about video games and the gaming industry.

other.dev_description_en: Jokes that don't really fit into any other category.
